title: Singin' in the Rain
description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

title: High Noon
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up, arrives on the noon train.

title: The Quiet Man
description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he finds love and conflict.

title: The Greatest Show on Earth
description: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer are told against a background of circus spectacle.

title: Ikiru
description: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

title: The Bad and the Beautiful
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.

title: Limelight
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Dramatic Score (Awarded in 1973)
description: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find meaning and hope in their lives.

title: Viva Zapata!
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: The story of Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata, who led a rebellion against the corrupt dictatorship of Porfirio Diaz in the early 20th century.

title: Moulin Rouge
description: Fictionalized account of the life of French artist Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec.

title: Come Back, Little Sheba
description: The Doc is an alcoholic struggling with his delirium; his wife Lola is a frumpy housewife who mourns the loss of her beauty and her lost dog Sheba.

title: Ivanhoe
description: A knight seeks to free the captive King Richard and put him back on the throne.

title: Forbidden Games
description: Two young children cope with the horrors of World War II by creating their own secret world and cemetery for animals.

title: Umberto D.
description: An elderly man and his dog struggle to survive on his government pension in Rome.

title: Monkey Business
description: A scientist finds the fountain of youth, but his formula gets mixed into the office water cooler, causing everyone to regress to childhood.

title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
description: A writer, Harry Street, reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on a safari in Africa.

title: 5 Fingers
description: The valet to the British Ambassador in WWII Turkey sells secrets to the Germans.

title: Don't Bother to Knock
description: A pilot in a hotel spots a beautiful woman in the opposite room, unaware that she is a mentally disturbed babysitter.

title: Sudden Fear
description: After a woman rejects an actor for a role in her play, he romances and marries her, but then she discovers his plot to murder her.

title: Angel Face
description: An ambulance driver is sucked into the life of a wealthy, beautiful, but dangerous young woman.

title: Bend of the River
description: A border raider turned wagon train guide races a corrupt gambler to ensure that a food shipment arrives to a starving mining camp.

title: Kansas City Confidential
description: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must find the real criminals to clear his name.

title: The Sniper
description: Police hunt for a sex criminal who is terrorizing the city with a high-powered rifle.

title: Othello
description: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his lieutenant Michael Cassio.

title: The Crimson Pirate
description: An 18th-century pirate captain and his partner involve themselves in a rebellion against the King of Spain on an island in the Caribbean.

title: Scaramouche
description: In 18th-century France, a young man sets out to avenge the death of his friend at the hands of a master swordsman.

title: The Prisoner of Zenda
description: An Englishman on vacation in a Central European kingdom is persuaded to impersonate his distant cousin, the rightful King, whom he closely resembles.

title: Pat and Mike
description: A spectacular female athlete and a rough-and-tumble sports promoter join forces and find romance.

title: Hans Christian Andersen
description: A fictionalized account of the life of Danish poet and story-teller Hans Christian Andersen.

title: The Lusty Men
description: A faded rodeo star mentors a younger man in the arena, but becomes attracted to his wife.

title: Clash by Night
description: A woman returns to her fishing-village home and marries a good-natured fisherman, but falls for his cynical friend.

title: The Big Sky
description: A keelboat expedition up the Missouri River encounters hostility from a rival fur-trading company and Native Americans.

title: Phone Call from a Stranger
description: After surviving a plane crash, a man visits the families of three of the victims he met on the flight.

title: My Cousin Rachel
description: A young Englishman plots revenge against his beautiful cousin, believing that she murdered his guardian.

title: The Narrow Margin
description: A detective protects a gangster's widow on a train ride from Chicago to Los Angeles while assassins try to kill her.

title: On Dangerous Ground
description: A rough police detective is sent to a rural area to investigate a murder, where he falls for the blind sister of the mentally unstable killer.

title: Rancho Notorious
description: A cowboy seeks revenge for the murder of his fiancée, leading him to a remote ranch run by an ex-saloon singer that serves as a hideout for bandits.

title: Son of Paleface
description: The Harvard-educated son of a Western hero goes out west to claim his inheritance, but finds trouble instead.

title: The World in His Arms
description: A sea captain pirates a Russian countess from her arranged marriage to a prince.

title: Against All Flags
description: A British officer goes undercover to infiltrate a pirate stronghold in Madagascar.

title: Blackbeard the Pirate
description: The notorious pirate Blackbeard battles rival pirates and the British navy for treasure.

title: The Importance of Being Earnest
description: Two bachelors use the same pseudonym, Ernest, on the sly, which is fine until they both fall in love with women using that name, which leads to a comedy of mistaken identities.

title: Europa '51
description: After her son commits suicide, a wealthy woman devotes her life to helping the poor and sick, but her husband thinks she is insane.

title: The Life of Oharu
description: The life of a woman in 17th-century Japan who falls from being a lady-in-waiting to a street prostitute.

title: Flavor of Green Tea Over Rice
description: A wealthy, childless couple deals with their marital boredom and the niece they are trying to arrange a marriage for.

title: Casque d'Or
description: In turn-of-the-century Paris, a woman falls for a reformed criminal, inciting jealousy in her gangster boyfriend.

title: Fanfan la Tulipe
description: A charming adventurer joins the army of Louis XV to avoid a forced marriage and finds romance with a gypsy's daughter.

title: Million Dollar Mermaid
description: The biography of Annette Kellerman, the Australian swimming champion who overcame a childhood disability to become a star.

title: With a Song in My Heart
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The story of singer Jane Froman, who fought her way back to stardom after being crippled in a plane crash.

title: The Marrying Kind
description: A couple on the verge of divorce recounts their life together to a judge.

title: Carrie
description: A young woman moves to Chicago and falls in love with a married restaurant manager, leading to tragic consequences.

title: Ruby Gentry
description: A poor North Carolina swamp girl is spurned by the man she loves and marries a wealthy man for spite.
